hero.title: Colmar on the Water
hero.subtitle: Discover the magic of Little Venice aboard our traditional boats. A timeless experience.

presentation.title: Alsatian Venice as you have never seen it before.
presentation.text: Let yourself be rocked by the lapping of the Lauch river. Our passionate boatmen will guide you through the historic districts of the tanners and the fishmongers. Enjoy a unique view of the colorful half-timbered houses, away from the crowds.
